text: Bella Hadid Gets Restraining Order Against Stalker Bella Hadid Gets Restraining Order Against Stalker EXCLUSIVE Bella Hadid just got a restraining order against a man who had allegedly been threatening her online and apparently lurking around her apartment. Brian Perez has been ordered to stay clear of Bella. He had posted a pic of Bella's apartment recently, and she fears he might be staking out her New York City apartment. Cops say Perez had been on a harassment campaign against Bella. According to legal docs, Hadid had received multiple Instagram messages from an account registered to Perez.
